short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tutorial creation made easy. Instantly make guided, step-by-step directions for any website. Directly in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create guided, step-by-step tutorials directly in your browser with iorad. This easy-to-use extension automatically captures your interactions with any website and generates shareable tutorials—no video editing or manual labeling required.

Key Features:

Automatically capture and identify user actions on websites.
Generate step-by-step tutorials in minutes.
Publish instantly to platforms like Zendesk, Salesforce, Slack, and more.
Save time and streamline documentation processes.
iorad is built with user privacy in mind and adheres to GDPR standards. Learn more at https://www.iorad.com/privacypolicy.

Simplify your documentation process—try iorad today!
